summary: When a gang boss is diagnosed with a terminal illness, he looks to two of his lieutenants to take over.
cast: Chapman To|Gregory Wong|Philip Keung|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Bonnie Xian|Singh Hartihan Bitto|Tarah Chan|Flora Cheung|Tony Ho|Cheuk-lap Hung|Vincent Wai Lam|Ling-Ling Mak|Deep Ng|Chun-Fung Wong|Tak-Bun Wong
title: Suen lo chor
